[console_scripts]
di = docker_interface.cli:entry_point

[docker_interface.plugins]
build = docker_interface.plugins:BuildPlugin
buildconfiguration = docker_interface.plugins:BuildConfigurationPlugin
googlecloudcredentials = docker_interface.plugins:GoogleCloudCredentialsPlugin
googlecontainerregistry = docker_interface.plugins:GoogleContainerRegistryPlugin
homedir = docker_interface.plugins:HomeDirPlugin
jupyter = docker_interface.plugins:JupyterPlugin
run = docker_interface.plugins:RunPlugin
runconfiguration = docker_interface.plugins:RunConfigurationPlugin
substitution = docker_interface.plugins:SubstitutionPlugin
user = docker_interface.plugins:UserPlugin
validation = docker_interface.plugins:ValidationPlugin
workspacemount = docker_interface.plugins:WorkspaceMountPlugin
